entry.title: Meetups are no longer synced to this site
entry.id: tag:desertpy.com,2019-09-15:/posts/2019/Sep/15/Meetups are no longer synced to this site/
entry.summary:
Unfortunately, Meetup.com has made it extremely hard to pull meetup data from their API in an automated way by a server.

We are no longer able to sync meetup posts to this site. Please check out the meetup.com group in the menu bar of this site for the â€¦
entry.content:
Unfortunately, Meetup.com has made it extremely hard to pull meetup data from their API in an automated way by a server.

We are no longer able to sync meetup posts to this site. Please check out the meetup.com group in the menu bar of this site for the latest meetup information.
